jp.go.enri.prml.dist

Class ONDE

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.go.enri.prml.dist.ONDE

  • public class ONDE
extends java.lang.Object
    Parameter of offset mixture distribution with Gaussian and Laplace components
    Version:
    1.0.1 (Last update: 06/12/2011)
    Author:
    Masato Fujita(Electronic Navigation Research Institute)
